body.textBody:
{
 "@context": [
 	"https://schema.pearson.com/context/content-context.jsonld",
    "https://schema.pearson.com/context/assessment-context.jsonld",
	"https://schema.pearson.com/context/schema-org-context.jsonld",
 "https://schema.pearson.com/context/learn-context.jsonld"
 ],
  
   "id": "urn:pearson:work:{"FT"."ASSESSMENT"."A_POST_METADATA".response.headers.uuid}",
 "sameAs": ["https://data.pearson.com/work/{"FT"."ASSESSMENT"."A_POST_METADATA".response.headers.uuid}"],
  

 "type": ["Work", "AssessmentInstrument"],
 "name" : { "en" :  "Some Name Modified" }, 
 "description" : { "en" : "Some Description1 Modified" },
  "timeRequired" : "PT5H30M",
 "keyword": {
 		"en": ["WordA Modified", "WordB Modified"]
 },
 "discipline" : "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/domain/art",
  "difficultyLevel" : "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/difficultylevel/difficult",
  "audience" : "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/audience/parentsonly"
}

{
 "@context": [
 	"https://schema.pearson.com/context/content-context.jsonld",
    "https://schema.pearson.com/context/assessment-context.jsonld",
	"https://schema.pearson.com/context/schema-org-context.jsonld",
 "https://schema.pearson.com/context/learn-context.jsonld"
 ],
  
   "id": "urn:pearson:work:{"FT"."QUESTION"."A_POST_METADATA".response.headers.uuid}",
 "sameAs": ["https://data.pearson.com/work/{"FT"."QUESTION"."A_POST_METADATA".response.headers.uuid}"],
  

 "type": ["Work", "AssessmentItem"],
 "name" : { "en" :  "Some Name Modified" }, 
 "description" : { "en" : "Some Description1 Modified" },
  "timeRequired" : "PT5H30M",
 "keyword": {
 		"en": ["WordA Modified", "WordB Modified"]
 },
 "discipline" : "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/domain/art",
  "difficultyLevel" : "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/difficultylevel/difficult",
  "audience" : "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/audience/parentsonly"
}

{
 "@context": {
  "id": "@id",
  "type": "@type",   
   "@language": "en",
	"sameAs": {
    "@id":"http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#sameAs", 
    "@type":"@id", 
    "@container":"@set"
  },
  "alignmentObjective" :"https://schema.pearson.com/ns/learn/alignmentObjective",
  "metadataType": "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/content/metadataType",
  "Work": "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/content/Work",
  "status": "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/content/status",
  "AssessmentItem": "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/content/AssessmentItem",
  "ClosedCaption": "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/content/ClosedCaption",
  "Transcript": "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/content/Transcript",
  "filename": "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/content/filename",
  "discipline": "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/content/discipline",
  "keyword": "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/content/keyword",
 
  "difficultyLevel": "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/learn/difficultyLevel",
  "trigger": "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/learn/trigger",
  "knowledgeLevel": "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/learn/knowledgeLevel",
  "hasAlignment": "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/learn/hasAlignment",

  "keywords" : "http://schema.org/keywords",
  "CreativeWork": "http://schema.org/CreativeWork",

  "name": "http://schema.org/name",
  "timeRequired": "http://schema.org/timeRequired",
  "description": "http://schema.org/description",
  "audience": "http://schema.org/audience",
        "pafId": "https://schema.pearson.com/ns/system/pafId",
        "alternateName" : "http://schema.org/alternateName",
        "caption" : "http://schema.org/caption",
        "copyrightHolder" : "http://schema.org/copyrightHolder",
        "contentUrl" : "http://schema.org/contentUrl",
        "thumbnail" : "http://schema.org/thumbnail",
        "dateCreated" : "http://schema.org/dateCreated",
        "dateModified" : "http://schema.org/dateModified"
 },

 "id": "urn:pearson:work:{"PL"."ASSESSMENT"."A_POST_METADATAjs".response.headers.uuid}",
"sameAs": ["https://data.pearson.com/work/{"PL"."ASSESSMENT"."A_POST_METADATAjs".response.headers.uuid}"],   
     
 "type": ["Work", "CreativeWork"],
 "filename": "SomeFileName Modified",
  "discipline": {"langString" : "en", "value": "Mathematics Modified"},
  "alignmentObjective": "g5 Modified",
  "difficultyLevel" : "Moderate Modified",
  "discipline" : "Discipline 2 Modified",
  "metadataType" : "AssesmentMetadata Modified",
  "name" : "g1 Modified",
  "timeRequired" : "2016-09-15T00:00:00-04:00",
   "keywords": ["WordA", "WordB", " Modified"], 
 "description" : "Some Description  Modified" 
  
  
  
  
  
}
